title: Data-Driven Mobile Microlearning Course for Quantum Computing Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Linear algebra, basic programming, and introduction to computer science
context.additional_context: Design of flexible learning structures for in-service professionals to pursue alongside work

learning_goals: They can explain core concepts of quantum computing (qubits, superposition, entanglement) through simulations optimized for mobile environments.
They can apply the quantum algorithm design process step-by-step based on real-world cases.
They demonstrate foundational-to-applied competencies by achieving 80+ points on the comprehensive final assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
